alert.note: Alert for Adams; Buffalo; Clay; Fillmore; Hall; Kearney; Nuckolls; Thayer; Webster (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 2:10AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Clay, northern Nuckolls, Adams, northeastern Kearney, southwestern York, southern Hamilton, western Fillmore, southeastern Buffalo, northwestern Thayer and southern Hall Counties through 300 AM CDT... At 210 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Juniata, or 7 miles northwest of Hastings, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hastings and Hansen around 220 AM CDT. Trumbull around 225 AM CDT. Glenvil and Inland around 230 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Harvard, Clay Center, Saronville, Sutton, Shickley and Ong. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 291 and 332. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Buffalo; Clay; Fillmore; Hall; Kearney; Nuckolls; Thayer; Webster
